arStrings.szText: The lost inventions of Zoltun Kulle now threaten Sanctuary. Delve dangerous Vaults and help a time-lost sorcerer face his past.

Beneath the Scouring Sands, an Apparatus created for good has been overtaken by demonic evil. You must regain control of it before the Demon unleashes its power on Sanctuary!

{c_highlight}{icon:bullet, 1}All new Questline & Boss:{/c} Recover the elemental Apparatus and defeat the demon Malphas.

{c_highlight}{icon:bullet, 1}All new New Dungeons:{/c} Conquer hazard-filled Vaults and loot their treasures.

{c_highlight}{icon:bullet, 1}All new Seasonal Companion:{/c} Arm your Companion with 39 new Powers and Modifiers.

{c_highlight}{icon:bullet, 1}All new Season Journey:{/c} Conquer 7 Chapters of challenges.

{c_highlight}{icon:bullet, 1}7 new Legendary Aspects & 6 new Unique Items:{/c} Explore new ways to build and play each Class.

{c_highlight}{icon:bullet, 1}All new Cosmetics:{/c} Acquire seasonally themed looks in the Battle Pass and other new looks in the Shop.
